column4: i try to use applications >> add/remove to install Inkscape on Ubuntu 8 but it sais W: Failed to fetch http://ch.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/i/imagemagick/imagemagick_6.3.7.9.dfsg1-2ubuntu3_i386.deb
Size mismatch
what is size mismatch?
sudo apt-get install imagemagick
that didnt work either Failed to fetch http://ch.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/i/imagemagick/imagemagick_6.3.7.9.dfsg1-2ubuntu3_i386.deb  Size mismatch
sudo apt-get clean; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get -f install sudo apt-get install imagemagick
: thanks..but another pile of errors..too big to  paste to the channel :)
&  ubottu : http://paste.ubuntu.com/141366/
if you comment out those repositories in /etc/apt/sources.lst does it work ok?
how do i do that? i am a newbie
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
and add a # character to the start of the lines defining the repos which are giving you issues
: none of these are listed in the sources.list file
they must be, thts how apt knows where to look for packages
http://paste.ubuntu.com/141373/
comment out the bottom 6 lines that you have added
ok...but i didnt add them :)
comment them out one line at a time, then try to update, some or one is bad
:ok the errors are gone...but i still dont see the application in the menus
what app?
i was trying to install inkscape originally...maybe i misunderstood......the steps we just did fixed the add/remove problem or installed the app?
: its working now...thank you
just need to clear those errors or no installs will take place
